dev.williamchung.services

Class ThreadService

  • java.lang.Object
    • dev.williamchung.services.ThreadService

  • public class ThreadService
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the ThreadService class which liaises between the servlet and repository dao. Each method is explained below.

      ThreadService() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deleteThreadById(java.lang.String threadId, User user)
      Deletes the Thread row in the database, if the User is the author (mapped by foreign key author_id).
      Thread getThreadById(java.lang.String threadId)
      Grabs a Forum by its id.
      java.util.List<Thread> getThreadsByForum(java.lang.Integer forumId)
      Grabs the list of all Threads with the foreign key Forum id.

      Inserts a Thread into the database.

      • setThreadRepository

        public void setThreadRepository(ThreadRepository threadRepository)

      • getThreadsByForum

        public java.util.List<Thread> getThreadsByForum(java.lang.Integer forumId)
        Grabs the list of all Threads with the foreign key Forum id.
        Parameters:
        forumId - passed by Servlet.
        Returns:
        returns an ArrayList of all the Threads related to the Forum given by id.

      • getThreadById

        public Thread getThreadById(java.lang.String threadId)
        Grabs a Forum by its id.
        Parameters:
        threadId - String passed by Servlet.
        Returns:
        returns a Thread object.

      • postThread

        public Thread postThread(java.lang.String threadTitle,
                         java.lang.String threadContent,
                         java.lang.Integer authorId,
                         java.lang.String forumId)
        Inserts a Thread into the database.
        Parameters:
        threadTitle -
        threadContent -
        authorId -
        forumId - parameters are passed by the Servlet from the form data in the request.
        Returns:
        Returns a Thread object after the database successfully writes the row.

      • deleteThreadById

        public void deleteThreadById(java.lang.String threadId,
                             User user)
        Deletes the Thread row in the database, if the User is the author (mapped by foreign key author_id).
        Parameters:
        threadId -
        user - String id and User user provided by Servlet.
